In order to save your time in searching and browsing applications and improve the intelligent experience of service, we adopt the personalized recommendation algorithm in the application recommendation and display service. After obtaining your authorization, the service will group users (people with similar characteristics will be put into the same group, and to protect user privacy, the number of people with similar characteristics in each group is at least 5,000) according to your application installation list and service use behavior (application exposure, clicks, downloads, and installation) information, so as to recommend and display applications to groups whose characteristic labels match those of the applications recommended and displayed. If you disable “Personalized Recommendations”, the applications recommended or displayed to you will be randomized, reducing their relevance to you. Meanwhile, you can also choose the labels based on which our algorithm recommendations work to adjust the recommendation and display of applications.
